name: Late To The Fight
description:
Hark! Tis the day of the arena duelling tourney yet here thy lays! Can our splendid knight reach the colosseum before daybreak?

In this game, you play as a knight who had overslept during an afternoon nap and finds themselves in a dangerous situation against time. Will he be able to traverse the magical cliffs and slash through slimes, orcs and even dragons in order to reach the tourney in time to participate?

Credits:

Ethan Munday - Programming, SFX & Music, General Polish

Connor Beach - Knight and Dragon Art

Bernardo da Costa - Slime and Orc Art 

Salie Read - Design Leader

Valerie Chuke - Background Art and Design Team

Alexander van Luipen - Technical Art
